name: Charlie Flesch
text: I love hungry howies and the food is great but this location needs to get its act together. Tell you 20 min wait it takes an hour and then the food is wrong. When you go in to tell them they smirk about it cause they know they did it on ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Eckert
text: Pics say 1,000 words!! The pizza and wings from this location is fantastic. I tried their curbside pickup and it went swimmingly.   Such a friendly staff to boot! Order today!

name: Karen Kossow
text: I get the $5 lunch special from here a LOT if you want a budget friendly lunch this is the place! You have lots of choices from salad to baked subs and its freshly made when you order it.

name: Thomas Buck
text: That have the best crust on their Pizza and Subs. If u haven't had the chance to try it,  you should. Beats all the others and is made in house daily üòÅ yummy üòã

text: This was my first visit to a Hungry Howies as I pass the location daily. The people were super nice when I arrived to pick up my order. I took advantage of the 2 items for $5.99 each, then paid for a full price, 2 topping medium pizza. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Sons
text: I ordered food and a hour and a half later I had to call and cancel.   They had called about a hour after placed my order to say it was going to be late.  I was fine with this and waited another 30 minutes.  They said it would take 2 days ‚Ä¶More

text: Food is always hot and good

name: Arielleave
text: Remember how good pizza you remember used to taste when you were a kid? Their pizza is like that, but with you as an adult.

name: Robert Zito
text: Surprisingly good and very reasonably priced.

name: Rae Chesley
text: I love this place! They have looked out very attentively for gluten intolerance. One time they even started a whole pizza over because they were unsure of cross contamination. This is the only gluten free delivery pizza place for me! I never have to worry and that is amazing!

name: Tiffany Sloan
text: The nastiest pizza I've ever tasted customer service was also horrible

name: Jason Swierczynski
text: Great staff, nice place, and good product. I visited this location recently and I was very impressed how the staff conducted themselves and the service they provided. They were constantly cleaning up the kitchen, but also the front of the store. I was also very pleased with the pizza. Thank you!

name: Abhishek gupta
text: Since pizza baking is manual process, the taste is always inconsistent.. Some days the pizza sauce n cheese is perfect.. Other days both are less than adequate

name: Nichole Weeks
text: This was excellent, no-muss-no-fuss, pizza! Straightforward toppings, easy online ordering, fast delivery. The crust was amazing and it arrived hot and ready in only 30 minutes!! The deliveryman was hilarious and friendly (shave and a haircut, two bits). Will definitely be ordering from Hungry Howie's again!

name: ROB' EM
text: Rude employees and management. Had one driver drive behind my car through the parking space i was backing in....door flyers even though it clearly states all over the street to not do that. PS. hey HH NOT ONE PERSON WANTS YOUR DOOR FLyERS SHOVED IN THEIR DOORS.

name: LogicOpposer
text: Had pizza delivery to my workplace. They went to the front door, even after being told NOT TO go to the front door. This location needs better communication about orders. Otherwise,  pizza was freash, came on time, and taste and looks ‚Ä¶More

text: First time eating at Hungry Howie's & I can say that I truly enjoyed it. The food was hot & enormous portions. We ordered the subs & when I say that we even had leftovers.

text: Love hungry howies quality service at a fare prices. Always delicious!

name: Leighann Young
text: Food is good but delivery guy added a tip to my receipt and when I spoke to the manager he really didn't act concerned. He said he would credit my card but he never did. Makes me wonder if this a a scam that management is involved in as well.

name: John _J
text: I went in trying to order a single slice and was told you have to purchase a whole pie. In all my life I‚Äôve never seen a pizza shop that doesn‚Äôt sell single slices - maybe I‚Äôm the one who‚Äôs been wrong this whole time?

text: Been to Hungry Howie's as my son got a award card of HH's from his school. The person at the counter was very friendly and appreciative of his award. Pizzas were good and he had it ready well with in the 15 mins he told us.

name: Jon Mowery
